actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 6103 of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Provides that if the holiday for a Federal employee occurs on a Saturday, the head of the department or person responsible for administering the employee's schedule shall designate, at least a week in advance, either that Saturday, the Friday preceding that Saturday, or the regular weekly workday administratively scheduled for the employee immediately following the holiday (which occurs on the regular weekly nonworkday) as the legal public holiday for the employee. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103 (b)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6103 of title 5, United States Code.
